name: Shoot the Moon (like literally)
description:
You landed a job as a destruction sequence manager. Your job: find the proper sequence to fire the Moonerator laser to destroy the moons. Find the perfect sequence for each moon!

In this puzzle game, you fire a laser to destroy neighboring colors in a moon. The remaining blocks fall toward the center of the moon until you've completely destroyed the moon. Each moon must be solved within a certain number of shots.

Throughout its 55 levels, the game tells the story of the Moonerator's universe, and introduces the player to the galactic politics that forced the destruction of so many moons.
